syncBehaviour.savedChangesSuccessfully:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message for successful saving of sync behaviour settings.
**UI Location**: Pop-up toast notification.
**When Users See This**: After successfully saving changes to the sync behaviour settings.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Saved changes successfully!"
syncBehaviour.failedToSaveChanges:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when saving sync behaviour settings fails.
**UI Location**: Pop-up toast notification.
**When Users See This**: When an error occurs while attempting to save sync behaviour settings.
**Technical Context**: This message serves as a fallback; actual error messages may come from the server.
**Current English**: "Failed to save changes."
syncBehaviour.somethingWentWrongWhileSav:
**Functional Purpose**: Generic error message for unexpected issues during save.
**UI Location**: Pop-up toast notification.
**When Users See This**: If a network error or unhandled exception occurs during the save operation.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Something went wrong while saving changes. Please try again."
syncBehaviour.syncBehaviour:
**Functional Purpose**: Section header for configuring GitHub sync behaviour.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected Section.
**When Users See This**: When navigating to the Sync Behaviour section of the GitHub Syncer settings.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Sync behaviour"
syncBehaviour.automatic:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Automatic' sync option.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Sync behaviour section → Sync type toggle button.
**When Users See This**: When viewing the sync behaviour settings.
**Technical Context**: Label for a toggle button. Represents automatic syncing.
**Current English**: "Automatic"
syncBehaviour.manual:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Manual' sync option.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Sync behaviour section → Sync type toggle button.
**When Users See This**: When viewing the sync behaviour settings.
**Technical Context**: Label for a toggle button. Represents manual syncing.
**Current English**: "Manual"
syncBehaviour.saveChanges:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to save the configured sync behaviour.
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Sync behaviour section.
**When Users See This**: After making changes to the sync behaviour options.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Save changes"
insiderBubble.insidersOnly:
**Functional Purpose**: Indicates that a feature or section is exclusively for Insiders.
**UI Location**: Within a bubble component next to a feature name or section header.
**When Users See This**: When viewing a feature or setting that requires Insiders membership.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Insiders only"
